name: Arcane Learning Curve
description:
The Game:

Arcane Learning Curve is a third person action game in which the player battles through armies of goblins in order to defeat the Evil Lord Imodius! The game is filled with eye popping graphics, clever jokes, and many many goblins!

The Team:

  • Designer/Voice Actor: Ben Miller
  • Producer/2D Art: Brayden Perez
  • Writer/Producer: Ryan Abney
  • Programmer: Max McLoughlin
  • Programmer: Godfrey Yang
  • Environmental Art: Jacob Hanna
  • 3D Art: Meiqi Ren
  • Sound Engineer: Meg Mordecai

(This game was developed at the University of Utah for Traditional Game Development 3710 in Spring 2022.)

This game also features partial controller support!
